Package io.github.moctave.weftspace

Class DataWriter

java.lang.Object
io.github.moctave.weftspace.DataWriter
public class DataWriter extends Object
A class which writes data from a node into a file.

    • write

      public void write(DataNode node, int indentLevel)
      Writes a node to the file.
      Parameters:
      node - The node to write.
      indentLevel - How many tabs should be inserted before the node.

    • nodeToLine

      public static String nodeToLine(DataNode node)
      Represents a node as a line to be saved to a file. Not to be confused with DataNode.toString().
      Parameters:
      node - The node to convert.
      Returns:
      A single-line representation of the node, excluding its children.

    • quoteWord

      public static String quoteWord(String word)
      Puts quotes around text, adapting between no quotes, double quotes, and backticks as necessary. Does not conform to Endless Sky human readability conventions, but uses the simplest possible quotes for a given word.
      Parameters:
      word - The text to quote.
      Returns:
      The text in a format that will be interpreted as a single token by a parser.
